events.message: The insured reported a car accident that occurred on April 28, 2024, involving a rear-end collision at a stoplight.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report mentioning vehicle collision and damages.
An agent with expertise in auto claims was assigned to handle this vehicle collision case promptly.
Customer was formally notified that the claim has been received and is now under review by our team.
Request sent for police report, photos of damage, and repair estimates related to the car accident.
All requested documents including accident report and vehicle repair quotes were received from the claimant.
Investigation team began assessment to verify circumstances and extent of damages related to the auto accident.
Investigation concluded confirming that insured was not at fault and damage estimates are consistent.
A fair settlement offer was proposed based on repair costs and policy coverage terms for the vehicle damage.
Customer responded expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and the claim handling process.
Claim was officially approved after customer's acceptance of the settlement terms for their vehicle repairs.
Payment for the settlement amount was processed and issued to the customer to cover the repair expenses.
The claim was successfully closed following full resolution and disbursement of funds for the auto accident.
All documents and case files relating to this vehicle accident claim were archived for future reference.
